extension.dc:title: COL Name Relation Extension
extension.name: NameRelation
extension.dc:description: Extension to Taxon Core to capture (nomenclatural) name relations as found in ColDP. This extension is an adaptation of the col:NameRelation entity to Darwin Core Taxon records.

property.name: relatedNameUsageID
property.dc:description: The object name usage this relation relates to. Refers to an existing TaxonID within the dataset.

property.name: relationType
property.dc:description: The kind of directed nomenclatural relation.

property.name: relationPublishedIn
property.dc:description: The reference or nomenclatural act where this nomenclatural relation was established.
property.comments: This is the full citation string of the reference

property.name: relationPublishedInID
property.dc:description: An identifier for the reference or nomenclatural act where this nomenclatural relation was established.
property.comments: A DOI or other identifier for the same reference as given in relationPublishedIn
